00002 #
00003 #  Implements unary minus
00004 #
00005 package Parser::UOP::minus;
00006 use strict;
00007 our @ISA = qw(Parser::UOP);
00008 
00009 #
00010 #  Check that the operand is OK.
00011 #
00012 sub _check {
00013   my $self = shift;
00014   return if ($self->checkInfinite);
00015   return if ($self->checkString);
00016   return if ($self->checkList);
00017   return if ($self->checkNumber);
00018   $self->{type} = {%{$self->{op}->typeRef}};
00019 }
00020 
00021 #
00022 #  Negate the operand.
00023 #
00024 sub _eval {-($_[1])}
00025 
00026 #
00027 #  Remove double negatives.
00028 #
00029 sub _reduce {
00030   my $self = shift; my $op = $self->{op};
00031   my $reduce = $self->{equation}{context}{reduction};
00032   return $op->{op} if $op->isNeg && $reduce->{'-(-x)'};
00033   return $op if $op->{isZero} && $reduce->{'-0'};
00034   return $self;
00035 }
00036 
00037 $Parser::reduce->{'-(-x)'} = 1;
00038 $Parser::reduce->{'-0'} = 1;
